install.name: Bookmarks
install.author: Webmaster-Tips.net
install.description: A cross-browser module to allow visitors to quickly and easily bookmark you site, the current page, and up to 3 other links defined by you.

param.name: bus_format
param.label: Module Format
param.description: Select the display format for the module. See documentation for more information.

param.name: bus_display_image
param.label: Display Images
param.description: Do you want to display images in front of the links?

param.name: bus_break_line
param.label: Show line
param.description: Do you want to show the seperation line in the module? See documentation for more information.

param.name: bus_site
param.label: Show Bookmark Site
param.description: Do you want to show the Bookmark Site link?

param.name: bus_site_def_image
param.label: Bookmark Site Image
param.description: Do you want to use the default graphic for the Bookmark Site link (default) or your own custom graphic (user)?

param.name: bus_site_image
param.label: Bookmark Site Image File
param.description: If you are using your own image for the Bookmark Website link, enter the filename here. See documentation for more information.

param.name: bus_page
param.label: Show Bookmark Page
param.description: Do you want to show the Bookmark Page link?

param.name: bus_page_def_image
param.label: Bookmark Page Image
param.description: Do you want to use the default graphic for the Bookmark Page link (default) or your own custom graphic (user)?

param.name: bus_page_image
param.label: Bookmark Page Image File
param.description: If you are using your own image for the Bookmark Page link, enter the filename here. See documentation for more information.

param.name: bus_b1
param.label: Show Bookmark 1
param.description: Do you want to show the Bookmark 1 link?

param.name: bus_b1_def_image
param.label: Bookmark 1 Image
param.description: Do you want to use the default graphic for the Bookmark 1 link (default) or your own custom graphic (user)?

param.name: bus_b1_image
param.label: Bookmark 1 Image File
param.description: If you are using your own graphic for the Bookmark 1 link, enter the filename here. See documentation for more information.

param.name: bus_b1_text
param.label: Bookmark 1 Link Text
param.description: Link text to appear on the website for Bookmark 1.

param.name: bus_b1_title
param.label: Bookmark 1 Link Title
param.description: Title of page to be bookmarked.

param.name: bus_b1_url
param.label: Bookmark 1 Link URL
param.description: Complete URL (including http, etc) for Bookmark 1.

param.name: bus_b2
param.label: Show Bookmark 2
param.description: Do you want to show the Bookmark 2 link?

param.name: bus_b2_def_image
param.label: Bookmark 2 Image
param.description: Do you want to use the default graphic for Bookmark 2 (default) or your own custom graphic (user)?

param.name: bus_b2_image
param.label: Bookmark 2 Image File
param.description: If you are using your own graphic for Bookmark 2, enter the filename here. See documentation for more information.

param.name: bus_b2_text
param.label: Bookmark 2 Link Text
param.description: Link text to appear on the website for Bookmark2

param.name: bus_b2_title
param.label: Bookmark 2 Link Title
param.description: Title of page to be bookmarked.

param.name: bus_b2_url
param.label: Bookmark 2 Link URL
param.description: Complete URL (including http, etc) for Bookmark 2.

param.name: bus_b3
param.label: Show Bookmark 3
param.description: Do you want to show the Bookmark 3 link?

param.name: bus_b3_def_image
param.label: Bookmark 3 Image
param.description: Do you want to use the dfault graphic for Bookmark 3 (default) or your own custom graphic (user)?

param.name: bus_b3_image
param.label: Bookmark 3 Image File
param.description: If you are using your own graphic for Bookmark 3, enter the filename here. See documentation for more information.

param.name: bus_b3_text
param.label: Bookmark 3 Link Text
param.description: Link text to appear on the website for Bookmark 3.
